title: why do some champs get nerfed while others are free to rain thier terror ?
body:
why are these champs nerfed constantly, some to the point of inviability
diana
zyra
elise
nidalee
reksai
while others are left to terrorize the rift
zed
fizz
lee sin
j4
nasus ( decided to add this one to the list seing as riot refuses to fix him )
